mapper.insert: insert into userInfo ( id, roleId, name, img, sign, pwd, idCard, phone, addr, gender, birthday, classId, deptId, createTime ) values ( seq_for_userInfo.nextval, #{obj.roleId}, #{obj.name}, #{obj.img}, #{obj.sign}, #{obj.pwd}, #{obj.idCard}, #{obj.phone}, #{obj.addr}, #{obj.gender}, #{obj.birthday}, #{obj.classId}, #{obj.deptId}, sysdate )
